snippet: Robin van Persie scored three goals Saturday as a resurgent Arsenal defeated Chelsea, 5-3, at Stamford Bridge in the English Premier League.
lead_paragraph: Robin van Persie scored three goals Saturday as a resurgent Arsenal defeated Chelsea, 5-3, at Stamford Bridge in the English Premier League.

headline.main: Arsenal Sends Chelsea to 2nd League Loss in Row
headline.print_headline: Arsenal Sends Chelsea To 2nd League Loss in Row
headline.seo: Arsenal Sends Chelsea to Second League Loss in Row
